p: Pharmacological activities: C. asiatica is well known for its broad pharmacological activities such anti-inflammatory, antioxidative stress, antiapoptotic effects, neuroprotective effects, wound healing, antipsoriatic, antiulcer, hepatoprotective, antidepressant activity, nootropic activity, anticonvulsant, sedative, immunostimulant, cardioprotective, antidiabetic, cytotoxic and antitumor, antiviral, antibacterial, insecticidal and antifungal [ 50].
